mapper.select: SELECT p.id, t.name "teamName", p.name "playerName", p.position, IFNULL(e.reason,"")"reason" , IFNULL(e.createDate,"") "createDate", ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM player WHERE name < p.name ) AS no FROM player p LEFT OUTER JOIN expulsion e ON p.id = e.playerId INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id WHERE p.teamId = #{teamId} order by No
